name: APHRODITE
effect: (Effect: Whenever Venus is terraformed 1 step, you gain 2 megacredit.)

name: celestic
effect: (Action: Add a floater to ANY card. (1 VP per 3 floaters on this card.))
start: (You start with 42 megacredit. As your first action, reveal cards from the deck until you have revealed 2 cards with a floater icon on it. Take those 2 cards into hand and discard the rest.)

name: NUTECH
effect: (Effect: For each step you increase theprod of a resource, including this, you also gain that resource.)
